{
  "name": "@artonline/node",
  "productName": "ArtOnline Node",
  "setupName": "ArtOnlineNodeSetup",
  "version": "1.0.1",
  "description": "ArtOnline Node GUI",
  "company": "Artonline",
  "appId": "org.artonline.nodegui",
  "copyright": "Copyright Â© 2022 ArtOnline",
  "main": "./app/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "generate-docs": "sh node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "install": "npm i -g rollup",
    "start": "electron app/index.js",
    "build": "rollup -c && electron-kit",
    "dev": "rollup -c -w"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": {
    "name": "vandeurenglenn",
    "email": "vandeurenglenn@gmail.com"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@rollup/plugin-json": "^4.1.0",
    "electron-squirrel-startup": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jsdoc": "^3.6.10",
    "jsdoc-template": "github:braintree/jsdoc-template",
    "rollup": "^2.74.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@leofcoin/chain": "^1.0.7",
    "@leofcoin/peernet": "^0.11.25",
    "@vandeurenglenn/debug": "^1.0.0",
    "@vandeurenglenn/flex-elements": "^0.1.0",
    "@vandeurenglenn/little-pubsub": "^1.3.3",
    "electron": "^18.2.4"
  }
}
name: package.json
